snippet.title: SteamWorld Dig 2 - Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
SteamWorld Dig is back, and this time – it’s dig or die! Dig deep, gain riches and unearth the terrors of the underworld in this platform mining adventure forged in Metroidvania flames. Coming to Nintendo Switch and more in 2017.

Official website: http://imageform.se/game/steamworld-dig-2/

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/imageform
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/imageform
